Compute all kernel matrices of a model

Source: R/stanfunctions.R
cpp_kernel_all.Rd

This is a wrapper for STAN_kernel_all

cpp_kernel_all(
  n1,
  n2,
  K_const,
  components,
  x1,
  x2,
  x1_unnorm,
  x2_unnorm,
  alpha,
  ell,
  wrp,
  beta,
  teff,
  vm_params,
  idx1_expand,
  idx2_expand,
  teff_zero,
  STREAM = get_stream()
)

Arguments

n1

integer
n2

integer
K_const

list of constant matrices
components

an integer array
x1

continuous covariates
x2

continuous covariates
x1_unnorm

unnormalized versions of the continuous covariates
x2_unnorm

unnormalized versions of the continuous covariates
alpha

a vector of magnitude parameters
ell

a vector of lengthscale parameters or NaN
wrp

the input warping parameter or NaN
beta

a vector of heterogeneity parameters or NaN
teff

a vector of effect time parameters or NaN
vm_params

variance mask parameters
idx1_expand

expansion of beta and/or teff
idx2_expand

expansion of beta and/or teff
teff_zero

observed effect times
STREAM

an external pointer

Value

an array of kernel matrices

Contents
